name: Vegetable Biryani! (Stirfried Vegetables with Rice Indian style)
description: Vegetable Biryani is a vegan main dish that is packed full of flavor and veggie goodness.
recipeIngredient: 2 cups mixed vegetables (I used frozen ones as I was too lazy .. so carrots, corn, peas, bell pepper, green beans etc)
2 teaspoons saffron water (pinch of saffron soaked in warm water)
fried cashews and onions for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Wash rice and soak for 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Wash rice and soak for 10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: The rice can be cooked in a pressure cooker or a covered container. In the cooker pan, add oil and let it heat up on medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: The rice can be cooked in a pressure cooker or a covered container. In the cooker pan, add oil and let it heat up on medium heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in cumin seeds and wait for 2-3 minutes or until they start browning and giving out an aroma.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in cumin seeds and wait for 2-3 minutes or until they start browning and giving out an aroma.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the chopped garlic and mix well. Cook for 2-3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the chopped garlic and mix well. Cook for 2-3 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the rice and water and salt and give the mixture one slight whirl and keep the rice for cooking. 1 whistle in pressure cooker and 10-15 minutes on covered container. The rice should be cooked to almost cooked, but not fully cooked. Keep rice aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the rice and water and salt and give the mixture one slight whirl and keep the rice for cooking. 1 whistle in pressure cooker and 10-15 minutes on covered container. The rice should be cooked to almost cooked, but not fully cooked. Keep rice aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, heat oil and Add in the chopped onions and cook on medium heat for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, heat oil and Add in the chopped onions and cook on medium heat for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the Serrano peppers and red chili and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the Serrano peppers and red chili and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the cumin and coriander powder, turmeric and asafetida and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the cumin and coriander powder, turmeric and asafetida and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the rest of the spices(bay leaves, cardamom,. cinnamon, cloves) and mix well. Cook for another 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the rest of the spices(bay leaves, cardamom,. cinnamon, cloves) and mix well. Cook for another 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the thawed vegetables, salt and ginger and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the thawed vegetables, salt and ginger and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook for 5 minutes or until veggies are half cooked.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook for 5 minutes or until veggies are half cooked.

recipeInstructions.text: Reduce heat to low and spread out the veggies to cover the bottom evenly. If you have a slim pan with more depth, you can keep some veggies to add another layer.
recipeInstructions.name: Reduce heat to low and spread out the veggies to cover the bottom evenly. If you have a slim pan with more depth, you can keep some veggies to add another layer.

recipeInstructions.text: Top the veggies with half of the coriander and mint leaves.
recipeInstructions.name: Top the veggies with half of the coriander and mint leaves.

recipeInstructions.text: Top this off with rice and sprinkle the saffron water on the rice.
recipeInstructions.name: Top this off with rice and sprinkle the saffron water on the rice.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle some lemon juice on it as well.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle some lemon juice on it as well.

recipeInstructions.text: Top the rice with the remaining coriander and mint leaves.
recipeInstructions.name: Top the rice with the remaining coriander and mint leaves.

recipeInstructions.text: You can add addition veggies and rice layers. I made only one layer.
recipeInstructions.name: You can add addition veggies and rice layers. I made only one layer.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover the container and cook on low for 10-15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover the container and cook on low for 10-15 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with 1/2 cup fried cashews and 1/2 cup fried onions.
recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with 1/2 cup fried cashews and 1/2 cup fried onions.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot with yogurt or raita!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot with yogurt or raita!
